WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS 1100Z TO 2000Z DAILY
   12 THRU 19 MAR BY M/V BIG JOHN VI AND
   FIRST SKI, BERGE PHAN XI PANG, GEOR GITSI,
   AOM GAIA, FRANZ SCHULTE E IOLERIN IN 24-11.00S
   046-21.00W. WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 192100Z MAR 22.
